Title: Glucometer Prototype
Description: the course project of Software Project Management
HomeWiki:
- Project Description
This is a course project of Software Project Management.
The Glucometer is a device which help people test their blood sugar. But here this software project is only a prototype of the Glucometer. This project try to implement / imitate the functions which defined in the SRS(Software Requirement Specification) document. For example: auto-shutdown, display device status, show the test result, etc.


- Who are we
We are Group6 at this class. ^_^
(Can, Han, Miao, Holly)
